shall.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: used to emphasize that something will definitely happen, or that you are determined that something should happen
shall.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The truth shall make you free.
I said you could go, and so you shall.
shall.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: used in official documents to state an order, law, promise etc
shall.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: All payments shall be made in cash.
